ygData.subject: Re: Mutants
ygData.msgSnippet: Ice landed on Alliance Island, her signal jammer still active, she didn t like the fact thet the mutants had split up. she transformed to her robot form

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Ice landed on Alliance Island, her signal jammer still active, she didn't
like the fact thet the mutants had split up. she transformed to her robot
form mentally scanning the area for any sign of Silver Scout. She didn't
know what she was looking for but she hoped to find it soon. everywhere
around her she sensed bots busy at work, to busy she hoped to notice her.
She used the DNA scanner to search for the mutant virus that was inside them
all. Not finding that she turned around. The bot with the arms and legs of a
polar bear was ready to transform to owl when she sensed someone comeing
toward her. (Mustex)

Back in spain the other mutants constantly searched for any sign of the
missing mutant. Lunarpine caught a scent but it was cold and untraceable. It
had stopped in one spot where she must have gone airborne.
----- Original Message -----
From: <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 19, 2001 4:34 AM
Subject: Re: Mutants


> As Mustex approached the signal's source he tripped. Looking back to
> see what it was a book. He examined it and found it to have belonged
> to the Rocak, the ancestors of all robots,even more advanced than the
> Vok. It would have been Elementary to them,but ti him it would be
> incredibly advanced. This book held the secret to polarizing energy
> (I'll explain when Mustex is face to face with Veratis).
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> >  Mustex cautiously walked along "Alliance Island". Suddenly he
> > detected a Mutant Frequency. It Quickly ended. He checked his
> > computer. It had only lasted 2.8 seconds. It was unlikely,but it
> > could be explained by a jammer malfunction that had fixed itself.
> He
> > raced to the source.
